entry.title: Jawatan Kosong Universiti Teknologi Mara Cawangan Johor Terkini

link.title: Jawatan Kosong Universiti Teknologi Mara Cawangan Johor Terkini

entry.content:
Jawatan Kosong Universiti Teknologi Mara Cawangan Johor Terkini

Maklumat iklan kerja kosong yang ditawarkan oleh Universiti Teknologi Mara Cawangan Johor.

Calon yang berkelayakan dan memenuhi syarat-syarat yang ditetapkan sila memohon untuk mengisi kekosongan kerja seperti yang diiklankan dibawah sebelum Tarikh Tutup: 06 December 2020.

Kekosongan

  • Pengawal Keselamatan – KP11

Kelayakan

  • Warganegara Malaysia, berumur 18 tahun keatas dan berkelayakan

Cara Permohonan

Klik pautan ‘Iklan Penuh Jawatan’ dibawah dan rujuk maklumat permohonan, syarat kelayakan dan tarikh tutup permohonan kerja tersebut. Calon yang disenaraikan pendek sahaja akan dipanggil temuduga.

Iklan Penuh Jawatan
entry.summary: Jawatan kosong Universiti Teknologi Mara Cawangan Johor terkini untuk kekosongan Pengawal Keselamatan – KP11

entry.title: Jora Jobs Vacancies Sales Assistant
entry.content:
Jora Jobs is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Sales Assistant position. If you currently looking for new job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Jubin BMS (1990) Sdn Bhd
Job Qualifications:
  • Basic computer knowledge such as Word And Excel
  • Able to speak mandarin would be added advantage
  • Good Communication skill
  • Self - driven and willing to learn
  • Merchandise Arrangement: 1 year (Required)
Job Description:
  • Assist in merchandise arrangement
  • Assist sales team to find product if necessary
  • Restock merchandise on shelf
  • Keep track on the merchandise location
  • Ensure retail area clean and neat
  • Responsible for cashiering

Company Overview

Who are we?
Jora Malaysia is a search engine for jobs throughout Malaysia.
Unlike traditional job boards, users can search through thousands of career opportunities, all sourced from many job sites from around Malaysia. 
This Job Ad is one of the carefully selected pick from the clients of Jora Malaysia.
Your application will be redirected to them.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream job in Johor.
Apply Online
entry.summary: Jora Jobs is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the Sales Assistant which positioned at Johor

entry.title: ASK Resources Vacancies Retail Sales Associate - 3 Months Renewable Contract (Telecommunication Co)

link.title: ASK Resources Vacancies Retail Sales Associate - 3 Months Renewable Contract (Telecommunication Co)

entry.content:
ASK Resources is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Retail Sales Associate - 3 Months Renewable Contract (Telecommunication Co) position. If you currently looking for new job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Immediate vacancy under Malaysia's top leading Telecommunication Group. 
Retail Sales Team - 3 months contract (Renewable)
  • Basic Salary RM 1,500 + Allowance + Commission (Unlimited) 
  • Various locations @ Seremban, JB, Ipoh, Sunway. 
  • Casual working attire and fun working environment. 
Job Descriptions:
  • 50% - Serve walk in customers in outlet. 
  • 50% - Travel outdoor for roadshow and roving sales events. 
  • Promote and selling company products plan included postpaid, broadband, devices and others, 
  • Provide good customer service on enquiries and aftersales services. 
Job Requirements:
  • At least SPM holder
  • Good interpersonal and communication skills in English & Bahasa Malaysia
  • Fresh graduates are encouraged to apply, Training provided
  • Willing to work in retail hour / OT 
  • Possess own transport and willing to travel outdoor. 
Interested applicants may directly email your resume to asktalentrecruit@gmail.com
Regret to inform that ONLY SHORTLISTED candidates will be notified.

Company Overview

At ASK Resources, our mission is to provide efficient services to both jobseekers and employers. With over a decade of experience since being founded in 2005, ASK has been in partnership  with locally established companies, shared services, GLC, PLC and MNC clients across all sectors and industries with successful result. Headquartered in Puchong, Selangor with other offices in Melaka and Johor, our consultants aim to revolutionize the recruitment industry.
Whether you are someone seeking career opportunities, an employer who wants to hire the RIGHT talents that best fit your organization, or simply a fresh graduate looking for your first job, we encourage you to get in touch with us.
Think Career… Just “ASK”

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream job in Johor, Kuala Lumpur, Negeri Sembilan, Perak, Selangor, Putrajaya.
Apply Online
entry.summary: ASK Resources is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the Retail Sales Associate - 3 Months Renewable Contract (Telecommunication Co) which positioned at Johor, Kuala Lumpur, Negeri Sembilan, Perak, Selangor, Putrajaya

entry.title: Jora Jobs Vacancies Receptionist
entry.content:
Jora Jobs is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Receptionist position. If you currently looking for new job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

AX Furniture Sdn Bhd
Job Qualifications:
  • Pleasant personality, friendly, and has a positive attitude
  • Consistent, professional dress and manner
  • Excellent verbal communication and interpersonal skill
  • Competency in Microsoft applications including Word, Excel, and Outlook.
  • Strong and passionate in customer service & office administration
Job Description:
  • Receive visitors at the front desk by greeting, welcoming, directing and direct the visitors to the respective areas or informing the relevant staff of their arrival.
  • Answer, screen and forward incoming phone calls or taking brief message from caller.
  • Review and update on a regular basis the staff Telephone Extensions list, and advice all staff accordingly
  • Respond to all requests in a courteous, professional manner at all times
  • Control guests/vendors access to office area through appropriate approval from Head of HR Dept.
  • Receive, sort and distribute daily mail/deliveries or manage the record of the incoming mail/parcel ‘Log Book’
  • Provide directions for showroom, meeting room or others
  • Ensure lobby areas are well maintained in a professional and clean manner
  • Follow all safety and security policies, programs and procedures
  • Perform any other ad hoc tasks as and when required
  • Manage the office supplies (stationery, marketing collaterals, application forms, etc.)
  • Provide administrative and general support to HR & Admin Department
Experience:
  • Office Administration: 1 year (Preferred)
  • Receptionist: 1 year (Preferred)

Company Overview

Who are we?
Jora Malaysia is a search engine for jobs throughout Malaysia.
Unlike traditional job boards, users can search through thousands of career opportunities, all sourced from many job sites from around Malaysia. 
This Job Ad is one of the carefully selected pick from the clients of Jora Malaysia.
Your application will be redirected to them.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream job in Johor.
Apply Online
entry.summary: Jora Jobs is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the Receptionist which positioned at Johor
